resources:
FlipCam //For Permission No Permission Unavailability of permissions will render FlipCam not to function correctly.

 Please reopen the application or go to Settings, if you wish to grant permission. EXIT /FlipCam/ /FC_VID_ /FC_IMG_ .mp4 .jpeg .jpg yyyy-MM-dd-HH-mm-ss MMddHHmmss KB MB GB 00 : 00 : 00 0 MB VIDEO PHOTO MODE VIDEO SAVED IMAGE SAVED No Photos or Videos Delete Media Do you want to delete the Photo/Video? There seems to be no Internet Connection. Please check your connection, or enable Wi-Fi and try again. OK CANCEL Share Media Upload to Facebook Connection Failure How would you like to share? The media will be uploaded to Facebook CONTINUE Media queued for upload. Please check notification bar for progress. YOU HAVE BEEN LOGGED OUT OF FACEBOOK LOGOUT OF FACEBOOK Permission for Facebook WhatsApp not available WhatsApp needs to be installed to be able to share Photos/Videos to another WhatsApp contact. Upload to Facebook FlipCam requires you to login to Facebook to request below permission(s) to upload Photos/Videos: You have an option to logout before you upload. publish_actions LOGIN TO FACEBOOK NOT NOW Facebook WhatsApp 308890512940081 fb308890512940081 FlipCam Media Upload Service No internet connection. Upload Canceled. File %1$s has been deleted or moved. %1$s Uploaded. Upload Completed Successfully.
File %1$s %1$s upload in progress %1$s queued for upload. 
 File %2$s %1$s queued for upload. %1$s queued for upload.
Check status bar notification for progress. Finishing Upload. Upload Interrupted Upload in Progress Upload Completed Possible Connection Loss.
Retry for %1$d secs (%2$d).... Possible Connection Loss. Retrying... com.whatsapp com.facebook.katana FlipCam Settings Save Media in Phone Memory SD Card Phone Memory Limit Warning (%1$d %2$s) Phone Memory Limit Warning Disabled.
Click here to enable. The amount of phone memory below which you would like a warning. Auto Save To Cloud Google Drive Dropbox Show Memory Consumed For Video Show how much memory is being consumed by the current video recording, in the recording window. Reset All to Default SD CARD Location Please enter the SD CARD location below, starting from root.

 You can use File Manager (which can be downloaded from Play Store if you don't have one) to get location.

 FlipCam will create a folder 'FlipCam' inside that path and store all your Videos/Photos there.

 SD Card Path:
Please enter the SD CARD location below, starting from root.
 You can use File Manager (which can be downloaded from Play Store if you don't have one) to get location.
 FlipCam will create a folder 'FlipCam' inside that path and store all your Videos/Photos there.

 SD Card Path:
Path example : /storage/mnt/sdcard/ This will reset ALL FlipCam settings to their default values. OK CANCEL The SD Card Path does not exist or is invalid. Please try again. SD Card Path Saved. Phone Memory Limit Warning If the amount of available phone memory is below this limit, FlipCam will give you a warning message.
This could be anytime during video recording, or before you start to shoot a video/photo. Phone Memory Threshold Threshold value should be
 greater than 0 Please enter a number greater than 0 Phone memory threshold set to %1$s %2$s. Disable Threshold Check The threshold entered is the same or more than the internal storage (%1$s %2$s) of your phone. Please enter a lower value. Auto Save to %1$s CONTINUE NOT NOW This option will automatically save your photo/video from now on onto %1$s.
You may be prompted to sign in, if not signed in earlier. Sign In failed either due to Internet connection issue or cancellation by user. Signed out of %1$s. Auto upload disabled. Give a name for the folder which will be used to keep all FlipCam photos/videos in %1$s. Upload Folder in %1$s CREATE CANCEL Incorrect characters in folder name. Please try again. Folder Name is empty. Please give a folder name. Folder %1$s Created Successfully.
FlipCam will now auto upload your media onto this folder in Google Drive. Error in creating folder %1$s. Please check your internet connection and try again. We need the google accounts info to check if you have already signed in. FlipCam would like to read your contacts, only to check if you have already signed in to your Google Account. 
This is necessary to be able to auto upload to Google Drive. Click Yes to give permission. Account Check Permission YES LATER FlipCam will now auto upload your media onto %1$s folder in Google Drive. Auto upload disabled. Signing into %1$s for authentication. Please Wait... Sign In to %1$s
